query:
-- Get the SAQ Lab program ID
SET @saq_lab_id = (SELECT id FROM programs WHERE slug = 'saq-lab' LIMIT 1);

-- Add Tuesday schedule (using a date with time for timestamp columns)
INSERT INTO schedules (programId, dayOfWeek, startTime, endTime, location, sessionType, isRecurring, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (
  @saq_lab_id,
  'tuesday',
  '2026-01-07 19:00:00',
  '2026-01-07 20:00:00',
  'The Academy Training Facility',
  'regular',
  true,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);

-- Add Thursday schedule
INSERT INTO schedules (programId, dayOfWeek, startTime, endTime, location, sessionType, isRecurring, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (
  @saq_lab_id,
  'thursday',
  '2026-01-09 19:00:00',
  '2026-01-09 20:00:00',
  'The Academy Training Facility',
  'regular',
  true,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);
